verbs.description: [V: According] to testimony given by some NFL owners as part of a grievance filed by former quarterback Colin Kaepernick , Trump loomed large over the NFL discussions over the anthem protests , according to a report .

According to [ARG1: testimony] [V: given] [ARG0: by some NFL owners] [ARGM-ADV: as part of a grievance filed by former quarterback Colin Kaepernick] , Trump loomed large over the NFL discussions over the anthem protests , according to a report .
